latestAction.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 275 (Roll no. 644).

Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Murphy (CT) amendment (A071). Mr. Young (FL) stated that the provisions of the Murphy (CT) amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 212 (Roll no. 346).
On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 240 (Roll no. 235).
